Module za.ac.mandela.WRPV301.Capstone
Package za.ac.mandela.WRPV301.Capstone.Combat

Interface Combatant

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Enemy, Ghost, Humanoid, Insect, Player
    public interface Combatant
    A common interface for entities involved in a Fight

    • Method Detail

      • getAttackSuccessRoll

        boolean getAttackSuccessRoll​(int defenseModifier)
        Gets the success of this Combatant's attack roll
        Parameters:
        defenseModifier - the target's defense modifier
        Returns:
        true if the attack is successful

      • getDamageRoll

        int getDamageRoll()
        Returns:
        the amount of damage inflicted by this Combatant's attack

      • getDefenseModifier

        int getDefenseModifier()
        Returns:
        the percentage by which this target reduces the likelihood of successful attacks

      • receiveAttack

        void receiveAttack​(Combatant from)
        Applies incoming attacks to this Combatant
        Parameters:
        from - the source of the attack

      • initiateAttack

        void initiateAttack​(Combatant against)
        Applies an attack from this Combatant to another
        Parameters:
        against - the target Combatant

      • getCurrentFight

        Fight getCurrentFight()
        Returns:
        the fight this combatant is currently a member of, which may be null

      • setCurrentFight

        void setCurrentFight​(Fight currentFight)
        Sets the current fight for this Combatant
        Parameters:
        currentFight - the fight instance to set as the current fight for this Combatant

      • getCombatantDescriptor

        java.lang.String getCombatantDescriptor()
        Returns:
        a more specific short descriptor than Describable#getShortDescription()
